predicate.note: Frames file for 'deter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'prevent'.

roleset.name: deter, scare away

example.name: transitive
example.text: Moreover, such a sale could help Armstrong reassure its investors and deter the Belzbergs, who own a 9.85% stake in the Lancaster, Pa., company.
example.arg: the Belzbergs, who own a 9.85% stake in the Lancaster, Pa., company

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Mary could not deter John's amorous advances, even with a frying pan to the head.
example.arg: a frying pan to the head.

roleset.note: That John, he's a determined one. I wonder if there's a link between 'deter' and 'determine'?
